Header.title: Collaborative Decision Making
Header.paragraph: A collaborative decision making platform for organizations to save time, remove bias, and make informed group decisions.

About.paragraph: DecisionHub is a digital end-to-end decision making platform that allows organizations to easily make unbiased group decisions involving multiple stakeholders.
About.paragraph2: Our web platform handles the interactions between all stakeholders including the admins, applicants and reviewers.

Testimonials.text: I liked Arbitrium a lot. I didn't think I would really care about the improvements... but it was a lot more enjoyable to use.
Testimonials.name: Dan Collens, Cofounder at OurGroceries, Inc.

Testimonials.text: Way easier than what we were using before.
Testimonials.name: Barbara Hill, former Director at KidsAbility

Testimonials.text: Saved 1000s of hours of reviewers time.
Testimonials.name: Rose Greenside, Executive Director at Social Venture Partners

Testimonials.text: Very simple and easy to use.
Testimonials.name: Jane Arnold, board member for SVP and Canadian Cancer Society
